title: SCP-3651 Art Piece Wallpaper
content:

[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[=]]
[[size xx-large]]SCP-3651 Art Piece Wallpaper [[/size]]
[[/=]]
----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |hover-enlarge=--]
|enlarge-amount=6
|speed=250
|float=false
|width=100%
|url=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/ananomalouswriter/SCP%203651%20Desktop%20With%20Text.jpg
|add-caption=true
|caption=SCP-6427
]]
 _
Another article to add to my specialized Art Piece Wallpaper series. This one was part of the Art Exchange for the marvelous J Dune. The prompt was any article by J Dune and 3651 caught my eye. With a vector pictogram style thumbnail image[[footnote]]As seen on the TV[[/footnote]], I thought this be right up my alley as it be reminiscent of the art style in [[[https://youtu.be/BhaBZTxNpJs| SCPMAD]]] videos. And I was greeted with a wonderful article with an immersive atmosphere. I decided to combine the TV broadcast mentioned and the bridge seen in the article to make the above all in dense atmospheric fog.

> Read the original article for the full experience: [[footnote]]Do it now.[[/footnote]]
> SCP-3651 ⁠— Chalk Children
> Written by:  J Dune
> Link: https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3651

Animated Live Wallpaper [[[https://youtu.be/KSm_iF5wImQ | HERE]]]
 _
 _
Want to return to my main art hub? Click [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ananomalouswriter-s-wallpaper-place-and-more| HERE]]]
 _
